author: ddp
msg: Fixed:  Was using the SystemClassLoader when loading a class that
is ignored by the ClassLoader.  Now, it uses "deferTo".

author: ddp
msg: These changes are to allow BCEL to pull Classfiles from
either a ClassLoader (such as AntClassLoader) or off of
the ClassPath the way it used to.

author: enver
msg: Add checks for missing or wrongly-typed referenced fields.

author: mdahm
msg: Be less picky about padding bytes
